Package com.guigarage.css

Class CssHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guigarage.css.CssHelper
  • public class CssHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create Styleable properties and CSSMetaData instances

    • Method Detail

      • createCssMetaDataList

        public static java.util.List<javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,​?>> createCssMetaDataList​(java.util.List<javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,​?>> baseList,
                                                                                                                   javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,​?>... metaData)
        Creates a List of CssMetaData instances that is merged by the given parameters
        Parameters:
        baseList - A basic list. All elements of the list will be in the returned list
        metaData - An array of CssMetaData instances. All instances will be in the returned list
        Returns:
        A list with all given CssMetaData instances

      • createCssMetaDataList

        public static java.util.List<javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,​?>> createCssMetaDataList​(javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,​?>... metaData)
        Creates a List of CssMetaData instances that is merged by the given parameters
        Parameters:
        metaData - An array of CssMetaData instances. All instances will be in the returned list
        Returns:
        A list with all given CssMetaData instances

      • createProperty

        public static <S extends javafx.css.Styleable,​V> javafx.css.StyleableObjectProperty<V> createProperty​(DefaultPropertyBasedCssMetaData<S,​V> metaData,
                                                                                                            S styleable)
        Creates a StyleableObjectProperty instance that is parametrized by the given parameters. The returned property must be defined as a field in the given Styleable class. The property will be a SimpleStyleableObjectProperty
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type of the Styleable
        V - value type of the property
        Parameters:
        metaData - The CssMetaData instance
        styleable - The styleable that contains the property field. Mostly this will be a JavaFX Control class
        Returns:
        a styleable property that can be used in a Styleable class like a Control
        See Also:
        SimpleStyleableObjectProperty

      • createProperty

        public static <S extends javafx.scene.control.Control,​V> javafx.css.StyleableObjectProperty<V> createProperty​(SkinPropertyBasedCssMetaData<S,​V> metaData,
                                                                                                                    javafx.scene.control.SkinBase<S> skin)
        Creates a StyleableObjectProperty instance that is parametrized by the given parameters. The property will be a SimpleStyleableObjectProperty. The returned property must be defined as a field in the Skin class of the given Control class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type of the Control
        V - value type of the property
        Parameters:
        metaData - The CssMetaData instance
        skin - The Skin that contains the property field.
        Returns:
        a styleable property that can be used in the Skin of a Control
        See Also:
        SimpleStyleableObjectProperty

      • createMetaData

        public static <S extends javafx.css.Styleable,​V> DefaultPropertyBasedCssMetaData<S,​V> createMetaData​(java.lang.String property,
                                                                                                                 javafx.css.StyleConverter<?,​V> converter,
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                                                                                 V defaultValue)
        Creates a CssMetaData instance that can be used in a Styleable class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type of the Styleable instance
        V - Value type of the property
        Parameters:
        property - name of the CSS property
        converter - the StyleConverter used to convert the CSS parsed value to a Java object.
        propertyName - Name of the property field in the Styleable class
        defaultValue - The default value of the corresponding StyleableProperty
        Returns:
        the CssMetaData instance

      • createSkinMetaData

        public static <S extends javafx.scene.control.Control,​V> SkinPropertyBasedCssMetaData<S,​V> createSkinMetaData​(java.lang.String property,
                                                                                                                          javafx.css.StyleConverter<?,​V> converter,
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                                                                                          V defaultValue)
        Creates a CssMetaData instance that can be used in the Skin of a Control.
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type of the Control
        V - Value type of the property
        Parameters:
        property - name of the CSS property
        converter - the StyleConverter used to convert the CSS parsed value to a Java object.
        propertyName - Name of the property field in the Skin class
        defaultValue - The default value of the corresponding StyleableProperty
        Returns:
        the CssMetaData instance
